description: SDLC workflow orchestration commands for comprehensive cradle-to-grave project lifecycle management from concept through production operations

phase-transitions.description: Critical SDLC phase transition orchestration with formal gate reviews

iterative-workflows.description: Dual-track Discovery and Delivery iteration workflows

quality-gates.description: Quality gate validation and handoff checklist execution

production-operations.description: Production deployment, hypercare monitoring, and incident response

cross-cutting.description: Continuous risk, requirements, and security management throughout lifecycle

quality-governance.description: Continuous improvement, architecture evolution, testing, and compliance

team-coordination.description: Team onboarding, knowledge transfer, and cross-team synchronization

project-management.description: High-level project orchestration, health checks, and intake workflows

utilities.description: Supporting utilities for artifact indexing, traceability, reviews, and analysis

commands.name: build-artifact-index
commands.description: Summarize key SDLC artifacts and produce short digests for agent context

commands.name: check-traceability
commands.description: Validate bidirectional traceability from requirements through code to tests

commands.name: create-prd
commands.description: Generate Product Requirements Document from stakeholder requests and vision

commands.name: flow-architecture-evolution
commands.description: Execute architecture refinement cycle with ADR creation and migration planning as product evolves

commands.name: flow-change-control
commands.description: Execute change control process with impact assessment, CCB review, and baseline management

commands.name: flow-compliance-validation
commands.description: Execute regulatory compliance verification across 8 frameworks (SOX, HIPAA, GDPR, PCI-DSS, ISO 27001, FedRAMP, CCPA, NIST)

commands.name: flow-concept-to-inception
commands.description: Orchestrate complete Inception phase from concept through Lifecycle Objective Milestone with automated validation

commands.name: flow-construction-to-transition
commands.description: Orchestrate Construction→Transition phase transition with production deployment, support handover, and hypercare monitoring

commands.name: flow-cross-team-sync
commands.description: Execute multi-team coordination workflow with dependency mapping, blocker tracking, and API contract management

commands.name: flow-delivery-track
commands.description: Execute test-driven implementation workflow with continuous quality gates and velocity tracking

commands.name: flow-deploy-to-production
commands.description: Execute automated production deployment with blue-green or canary strategies, smoke tests, and automated rollback

commands.name: flow-discovery-track
commands.description: Execute continuous requirements refinement workflow staying one iteration ahead of Delivery

commands.name: flow-elaboration-to-construction
commands.description: Orchestrate Elaboration→Construction phase transition with iteration planning, team scaling, and full-scale development kickoff

commands.name: flow-gate-check
commands.description: Validate SDLC phase gate criteria with automated checks and comprehensive reporting

commands.name: flow-handoff-checklist
commands.description: Execute handoff checklist validation between SDLC phases and tracks (Discovery→Delivery, Delivery→Ops)

commands.name: flow-hypercare-monitoring
commands.description: Execute hypercare monitoring period with 24/7 support, SLO tracking, and rapid issue response

commands.name: flow-inception-to-elaboration
commands.description: Orchestrate Inception→Elaboration phase transition with architecture baselining, prototype development, and risk retirement

commands.name: flow-incident-response
commands.description: Execute production incident triage, escalation, resolution, and post-incident review using ITIL best practices

commands.name: flow-iteration-dual-track
commands.description: Orchestrate dual-track iteration with synchronized Discovery (next) and Delivery (current) workflows

commands.name: flow-knowledge-transfer
commands.description: Execute structured knowledge transfer workflow with shadowing, reverse shadowing, and practical validation

commands.name: flow-performance-optimization
commands.description: Execute continuous performance tuning cycle with SLO framework, bottleneck analysis, and optimization patterns

commands.name: flow-requirements-evolution
commands.description: Execute living requirements refinement workflow with change control, impact analysis, and traceability maintenance throughout lifecycle

commands.name: flow-retrospective-cycle
commands.description: Execute systematic retrospective cycle with multiple formats, action tracking, and continuous improvement

commands.name: flow-risk-management-cycle
commands.description: Execute continuous risk identification, assessment, spike execution, and retirement workflow across SDLC phases

commands.name: flow-security-review-cycle
commands.description: Execute continuous security validation workflow with STRIDE threat modeling, automated testing, and vulnerability management

commands.name: flow-team-onboarding
commands.description: Execute new team member integration workflow with buddy system, starter tasks, and 30/60/90 day milestones

commands.name: flow-test-strategy-execution
commands.description: Execute comprehensive test strategy with 8 test levels, defect triage, and coverage validation

commands.name: generate-tests
commands.description: Auto-generate test suites from requirements with comprehensive coverage

commands.name: intake-from-codebase
commands.description: Scan existing codebase/product and generate intake documents in .aiwg/intake/ by analyzing code, dependencies, and infrastructure

commands.name: intake-start
commands.description: Initiate Inception phase workflow from completed intake forms with automated validation

commands.name: intake-wizard
commands.description: Generate or complete intake forms in .aiwg/intake/ (project-intake, solution-profile, option-matrix) with interactive questioning

commands.name: orchestrate-project
commands.description: High-level project orchestration coordinator managing phase transitions and workflow synchronization

commands.name: pr-review
commands.description: Comprehensive pull request review focusing on code quality, security, and maintainability

commands.name: project-health-check
commands.description: Comprehensive project health assessment with metrics analysis and recommendations

commands.name: project-timeline-simulator
commands.description: Simulate project timeline with Monte Carlo analysis and risk-adjusted forecasting

commands.name: retrospective-analyzer
commands.description: Analyze retrospective data to identify patterns and generate actionable insights

commands.name: security-audit
commands.description: Comprehensive security audit with threat modeling and remediation recommendations

commands.name: security-gate
commands.description: Validate security gate criteria with SAST/DAST scans and vulnerability assessment

commands.name: troubleshooting-guide
commands.description: Diagnostic and troubleshooting workflows for common SDLC issues
